name: LUXO Buddies
description: One of the most Classic games which we all know and love! LUXO Buddies makes its return with an assortment of exciting new features. Match cards either by matching color or value and play action cards to change things up. Race against other players to empty your hand before everyone else.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB or higher Storage: 70 MB available space
